Author: Exile13#4458
Content: where do i want to put the .conf file for tmux

Author: Exile13#4458
Content:
this is the directions
`$ cd
$ git clone https://github.com/gpakosz/.tmux.git
$ ln -s -f .tmux/.tmux.conf
$ cp .tmux/.tmux.conf.local .`

Author: Alright#0419
Content: @Exile13 we have 20 operators locked in for launch. It's possible that we could launch with 22 if everyone agrees. This wouldn't guarantee you a spot though, it would be left to provably fair lottery.

Author: Alright#0419
Content:
lottery would look something like this. 

1. We announce a future BTC block height. This block's blockhash will act as entropy for the lottery.
2. Participants entering the lottery will post some data to an oracle prior to the block happening.
3. We do `sha256(blockhash+participant_data)` (maybe `sha256(sha256(blockhash)+participant_data)`?)
4. Whichever 2 participants are closest to 0 get the open spot.

Author: Alright#0419
Content: open to suggestions on that btw

Author: Alright#0419
Content: Do believe we need a notary vote to veto sock puppets. Something like 51% of notaries are able to vote that they think a participant is a sock puppet( or otherwise unfit to run a notary)

Author: Alright#0419
Content: 2.5* participants must post a signed message from the same key to discord/github

Author: Alright#0419
Content: @Exile13 we can add you for now so you can get some experience, but this wouldn't be a guarantee that you have a NN position for launch

Author: Alright#0419
Content: ok wait for @blackjok3r he has much more experience changing NN eras than I do
